fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Fill an X amount of “X”s with a letter or number
-Mass glitch X amount of townies (1 use)
-Attack a player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Match glitching causes (XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX) to happen to what “X” is set to in your second ability
-You start off by filling only 1 “X” a night, unless you alter the amount
-You may not alter any “X”s in quotation marks
-Any “X”s in parentheses are optional to edit
-Spaces fill up an “X”
-A special character counts as an X
-You can be voted, but if you are hung, it will instead hang a random player.
-You bug out attackers, causing them to reroll their role into a role from the same faction and their attack will fail
-Your mass glitch cannot mass kill. If you attempt to make it, you’re immediately modkilled, even if you meant it as a joke. This cannot and will not be stopped. So don’t

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause X faction(s) to lose by wiping out 3 of their members
